channel.title: Art on lavafroth
channel.description: Recent content in Art on lavafroth

item.title: Somebody That I Used To Know
item.description: Reminds you of some song by Gotye? You’re right on track. No timelapses for this one.

item.title: Truce
item.description: A painting of the lead vocalist of Twenty Øne Piløts. I named the piece after one of my favorite songs from their album Vessel. Check out the timelapse video available over at Odysee.
